description:
In an abandoned European-style house at the edge of town, Sora is surprised when a stuffed animal talks to her. Although Sora is scared when it follows her home, she begins to feel like there is some reason for the situation and decides to help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sora and the Missing Stuffed Animal
ソラと, 忘れられたぬいぐるみ
